author: George Lee
title: Restrictions to fight virus should be extended - NPHET
description: The National Public Health Emergency Team is today expected to recommend that the current tight restrictions on movement introduced nearly two weeks ago to help contain the spread of Covid-19 should be extended past Easter Sunday.
content:
The National Public Health Emergency Team will meet again today and is expected to recommend that the current restrictions on movement introduced almost a fortnight ago to help contain the spread of Covid-19 should be extended.
